title: Sinopharm Covid Vaccine May Offer Poor Protection for Elderly, Study Says
content:
1. Sinopharm Covid Vaccine May Offer Poor Protection for Elderly, Study Says  Bloomberg
  2. COVID-19 Vaccines PSA: Side Effects – Marquis 30 seconds  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
  3. With eye on COVID-19 delta variant, Sanford Health goes it alone on employee vaccine mandate  INFORUM
  4. Bill would require minors in NC to have written consent from parent or guardian to get COVID-19 vacc  CBS 17
  5. Governors pin hopes on full vaccine approval as cases climb  The Washington Post
